00027 #ifndef _GR_MATH_H_
00028 #define _GR_MATH_H_
00029 
00030 long gr_gcd (long m, long n);
00031 
00032 // returns a non-zero value if value is "not-a-number" (NaN), and 0 otherwise
00033 int gr_isnan (double value);
00034 
00035 // returns a non-zero value if the value of x has its sign bit set.
00036 //
00037 // This  is  not  the  same  as `x < 0.0', because IEEE 754 floating point
00038 // allows zero to be signed.  The comparison `-0.0 < 0.0'  is  false,  but
00039 // `gr_signbit (-0.0)' will return a nonzero value.
00040 
00041 int gr_signbit (double x);
00042   
00043 
00044 #endif /* _GR_MATH_H_ */
